title: Updated Ventum One Tri superbike adds disc brakes, improved aerodynamics, new cockpit & storage
content:
This weekend, Utah will host more than the Ironman 70.3 World Championships. It will also be home to the official launch of the all new Ventum One triathlon super bike. But for those who arenâ€™t headed out West to take part in the race, Ventum has given us a sneak peek at the new bike

author: Zach Overholt
